lines.value: __newsectionlink__
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: i am currently streaming a video conference about the cherokee language and language revitalization efforts from western carolina university's cherokee language program where dr hartwell francis the former director is speaking
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: to paraphrase him he stated that the cherokee language community has been aware of this project for a decade but that many of the current wikipedia articles are of remarkably poor quality because of the influence of bot generated entries
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: this makes even looking at them incredibly demotivating because the challenge of fixing them is so daunting
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: thus he suggests cleaning up the project and perhaps revitalizing it through aggressive deleting of low quality entries
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: a possible alternative to mass deletion might be mass partial blanking to encourage more human created edits
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: a poor quality article could be reduced to some boiler plate text like xxx is in need of an article or xxx had the previous article replaced with this text because it was poor quality but please feel free to begin a new article now but in cherokee
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: i am not a cherokee speaker but i could help make these edits or teach someone else to if a boiler plate text and a list of the low quality demotivating entries were provided
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: i plan to notify dr hartwell francis about this thread and let him know that i believe an bold approach like this is warranted and feasible in order to deal with what appears like a stagnant project
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: any ideas
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: biosthmors talk 16:00 26 ꭰꮔᏹ 2018 utc ping to user:ooswesthoesbes who i see has helped start short articles here for example ꮳꮃꭹ ꭻꮎꮥꮆꮖꮝꮧ ꮪꮣꮵꮝꭼꭲ
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: biosthmors talk 16:16 26 ꭰꮔᏹ 2018 utc i also gave some remarks at the symposium at western carolina i'm derek
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: i think there would be interest in organizing an edit a thon out at western carolina and hopefully we could get some of the fluent speakers to attend along with advanced learners
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: it would be great if in preparation we could clean all the garbage articles out
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: i like the idea of blanking them with boilerplate
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: it would be nice if there was a bot to do this but if there are just a few hundred articles we could probably get it done manually
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: i'm not a speaker but could coordinate the translation of the boilerplate or template by a fluent speaker
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: what else should we be considering if we wanted to reboot this project with an edit a thon
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: r12ntech talk 18:24 9 ꭷꮹꮒ 2018 utc :i'm pretty sure we can get a user run a bot to mark all pages automatically
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: that shouldn't be too much work
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: ooswesthoesbes talk 08:18 10 ꭷꮹꮒ 2018 utc shall i make a request so someone will run a bot on this wiki to mark all pages with a category like
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: or would you prefer the category to have another name
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: ooswesthoesbes talk 09:23 13 ꭷꮹꮒ 2018 utc
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: i searched for ꭰꮉꮝꭷꭶꭿ at cherokeedictionary.net but there were no hits
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: i noticed that one source defined a water fall as ꭰꮉ ꭶꮩꭳꮝꭼꭲ but i believe that was derived a self published source for what it's worth
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: i wonder if it is an incorrect title
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: biosthmors talk 10:14 2 ꭷꮹꮒ 2018 utc
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: this wikipedia was created before the incubator system so there has apparently never been a major push to complete the interface translation
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: if anyone wants to work on this the cherokee portal on translatewiki is here and the direct link to the most important messages for the mediawiki interface is here here's a brief article on the topic translating the software that powers wikipedia r12ntech talk 19:32 11 ꭷꮹꮒ 2018 utc
lines.name: Cherokee

lines.value: considering we probably got a lot of clean up work to do i want to request admin rights to delete unsalvageable pages so we don't get a way too long backlog
